name: Allen wynn
coverLetter: I have trimmed a little less then 6 months still a little new to pulling leaves but can trim buds allday, right I am from place to place due to other issues and need a job I carry an I'd in my phone but only a picture I'm from Arizona visit all the time this year I moved to live here but under the circumstances have having no money to purchase my birth certificate to complete my licence I am stuck looking for any type of help. I'm 27 been here in grants for a month now I work hard & become dedicated to my job!! I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to work behind your company whether it's for a short or a long period of time, I plan to advance the many skills have already and explore more, you can never have to many talents.
